DOC.brief_summary: ZPU-003 EXT 2-year extension study ZPU-003 determine continue safety efficacy Proellex woman previously complete double-blind portion study .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Proellex Women Who Have Previously Completed Study ZPU 003
DOC.detailed_description: ZPU-003 EXT 2-year extension study ZPU-003 . The purpose study determine continue safety efficacy Proellex woman previously complete double-blind portion study . The desired primary efficacy outcome change vaginal bleeding baseline 14 month 17 month study drug . The total duration study 24 month include transition time , drug interval , follow-up visit ) . It expect 16 week drug interval menses subside return 4-8 week drug interval ( ODI ) .
DOC.criteria: Completed ZPU 003 study meet inclusion/exclusion criterion study . Low high grade cervical dysplasia , determine Papanicolaou ( PAP ) smear . Pregnant breastfeeding .
